name: LiquidIntake
0:
”Alexa open liquid intake”
”ask liquid intake to start a new bucket”
”ask liquid intake to add four glasses of water”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: liquid intake
des:
Water is essential for everyday life.
And it is necessary to keep in check the amount of water we drink everyday.
This skill will help you keep track of how much liquid intake have you done till now.

Use Commands:
open liquid intake
start a new liquid bucket
add four glasses of water
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
